headerDisplay: *Important:* For this plugin to work, you'll need to first pair the Selve USB-RF module manually with all shutters!

name.title: Shutter Name
name.description: Name of the shutter or room (e.g. Livingroom)

port.title: USB Port
port.description: Device path to Selve USB-RF module (e.g. /dev/tty.USB0)

showIntermediate1.title: Show intermediate position 1 (experimental)
showIntermediate1.description: Show a toggle button to allow moving to intermediate position 1

showIntermediate2.title: Show intermediate position 2 (experimental)
showIntermediate2.description: Show a toggle button to allow moving to intermediate position 2
